3.56(c) 
   
Sanitation. 
Cobwebs, hair, dead flies, and organic debris has accumulated in the rabbit housing room.  Such accumulations harbor 
disease hazards.  Premises shall be kept clean in order to facilitate prescribed husbandry standards.
